content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Pipe group system at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Belt group system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
 -  Ensure that the burner entities have sufficient fuel to operate
### Errors when using steam engine but not being connected to a pipe
 -  Connect the steam engine to a pipe to enable its operation
### Errors when using electricity group but not being plugged into electric network
 -  Plug the electricity group into the electric network to enable its operation
### Errors when using entities but having no ingredients
 -  Provide the necessary ingredients for the entities to operate
### Errors when using inserter entities but waiting for source items
 -  Provide the necessary source items for the inserter entities to operate
### Errors when using pipe group but being empty
 -  Ensure that the pipe group has sufficient fluid to operate
### Errors when using belt group but being empty
 -  Ensure that the belt group has sufficient items to operate
### Errors when using boiler but being out of fuel
 -  Ensure that the boiler has sufficient fuel to operate


### NAMESPACE
No new utility functions were defined in the given execution steps. 
The following variables were assigned:
* `EntityStatus.NO_FUEL` 
* `EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS` 
* `EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS` 
* `EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED` 
* `EntityStatus.EMPTY` 
* `EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT` 
* `EntityStatus.NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK` 
* `EntityStatus.WORKING`
